page.title: 06Dinnaton country club
page.content: This private country club is situated on the Cornwood-Ivybridge road,1.5km. from Cornwood.It opened in 1982 having previously been a restaurant placed in an old farmhouse.The sports club consists of:indoor swimming pool,3 squash courts,2 badminton courts, snooker & table tennis rooms,multi-gym sauna,cafe,children's room,clay pigeon shooting,fishing,five-a-side football pitch,and plans for a disco-floor and a golf course.Approx.500 families belong to the club,coming from as far as 40km.distant. It provides good-value entertainment for all the family,and being family- run,has a friendly atmosphere.
